Name: Battle Imagine - Muku King
Description:
Activates or advances Muku King's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Pulse Benediction.

Arcane! Pulse Benediction
Summons Boss: Muku King to channel Forest Energy, healing up to 10 friendly targets over time and dispelling debuffs during the healing for 10s.
Upon the skill cast, your healing received is increased for a period.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
